lines.text:
[deadpan]
Hungry! Shit, I could eat a frozen dog.
Well, we'll go on out to the kitchen and see if we got one already froze.
Well, I ain't no slab of meat to be auctioned off, but, what the hell. Fine by me.

[to Henry Moon just prior to his hanging]
You was the best I ever had... 'cept maybe for that circus fella.
I'll never forget you, Hermione. You was the first woman I didn't have to pay for.
[to a homely woman who's sizing him up for matrimony]
I wouldn't take you to a dog-fight if you was the defendin' champ!
Sheriff Kyle, you know I don't drink.
Poultry is just another way of sayin' chicken.
Hold on, Towfield, you're wrinklin' my good luck ban-dan-na.
